FILE: cm235490v11.0.txt
DYAD: PORTUGAL - ZAIRE
RIVALRY: RIV641
DISPUTE(S): MID1332 MID3206 

PS-LAST-CHANGED: 20180213
PS-LAST-CHECKED: 20180213

Territorial-Maritime-Boundary Issues Variables

MID1332 

TERRMID: MID1332 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID1332 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: 

TERRLINK: MID1332 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID1332 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID1332 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID1332 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID1332 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID1332 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID1332 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID1332 3 -- uncertain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES: MID1332 from Gibler, Miller, and Little 2016, mercenaries entered DRC from Portuguese Angola territory. Portugal denied this. Coded not civil war because this involved mercenaries, not a militarized rebel group, and coded uncertain because GML recommend this case be dropped, as the mercenaries were not connected to Portugal. 

CIVWARLINK: MID1332 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID1332 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID1332 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID1332 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID1332 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID1332 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

MID3206 

TERRMID: MID3206 3 -- not territory 
TERRMID-CER: MID3206 1 -- certain 
TERRMID-NOTES: MID3206 from Gibler 2018, several Portuguese soldiers accidentally crossed into DRC territory. They were held until Portugal released several Congolese civilians who were being held in Portuguese territory. Coded not territory because Portugal was not making a claim on DRC territory and the troops entering DRC was accidental. 

TERRLINK: MID3206 3 -- not third party link to territory 
TERRLINK-CER: MID3206 1 -- certain 
TERRLINK-NOTES: 

MARITMID: MID3206 3 -- not maritime 
MARITMID-CER: MID3206 1 -- certain 
MARITMID-NOTES: 

ISLMID: MID3206 3 -- not islands 
ISLMID-CER: MID3206 1 -- certain 
ISLMID-NOTES: 

CIVWARMID: MID3206 3 -- not civil war 
CIVWARMID-CER: MID3206 1 -- certain 
CIVWARMID-NOTES:

CIVWARLINK: MID3206 3 -- not civil war link 
CIVWARLINK-CER: MID3206 1 -- certain 
CIVWARLINK-NOTES: 

COUPMID: MID3206 3 -- not coup 
COUPMID-CER: MID3206 1 -- certain 
COUPMID-NOTES: 

COUPLINK: MID3206 3 -- not coup link
COUPLINK-CER: MID3206 1 -- certain 
COUPLINK-NOTES: 

RIVNOTES:

SOURCES-CR:

SOURCES: Gibler, D.M. 2018. Militarized Interstate Dispute Narratives, 1816-2010. Langham, MD: Rowman and Littlefield. 

Gibler, D. M., S. V. Miller, and E. K. Little. 2016. "An Analysis of the Militarized Interstate Dispute (MID) Dataset, 1816-2001." International Studies Quarterly. 60 (4): 719-730.
